text: The 1993 Akron Zips football team represented Akron University in the 1993 NCAA Division I-A football season as members of the Mid-American Conference. They were led by eighth–year head coach Gerry Faust. The Zips played their home games at the Rubber Bowl in Akron, Ohio. They finished the season with a record of 5–6, 4–4 in MAC play to finish in fifth place. ==Schedule== ==References== Akron Category:Akron Zips football seasons Akron Zips football
title: 1993 Akron Zips football team
